  • 10 PLACES NAMED AFTER QUEEN ELIZABETH II

    https://www.thestar.com.my/lifestyle/people/2022/09/09/10-places-named-after-queen-elizabeth-ii

    09/09/2022, 08:03

    70.0% Shortened!

    Seven decades earlier in 1931, this slice of Antarctica was discovered by the British, Australian and New Zealand Antarctic Research Expedition and named after the young Elizabeth, who was third in line to the throne.Roughly covering the section south of India, it is now part of Australian Antarctic Territory

    The former wasteland in east London that staged the 2012 Olympics was renamed after the Games to mark the diamond jubilee celebrating 60 years on the throne.Queen Elizabeth memorably opened the Olympics with a sequence that appeared to show her parachuting down to the stadium with James Bond

    The Parry Archipelago was renamed in 1953 to mark the coronation

    At the top of Ellesmere sits Alert, the northernmost settlement in the world

    The new £2.5bil (RM12.9bil) Heathrow Terminal 2 was officially opened by the monarch in 2014

    Queenstown was the first new town built on the city-state island to cope with its booming population and was named to mark the 1953 coronation.Around 100,000 people live in the 20sq km area

    ['queen', 'elizabeth', 'rename', 'mark', 'monarch']

  • CHARLES FINALLY BECOMES KING

    https://www.thesundaily.my/home/charles-finally-becomes-king-LG9796904

    09/09/2022, 08:03

    79.31% Shortened!

    Camilla -- Charles’ second wife -- trailed him at 48 percent

    - Queen Camilla - Born on November 14, 1948, Charles became heir to the throne at the young age of three years and three months

    The queen in 2022 settled years of speculation about what Charles’ second wife, Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall, should be called

    Theoretically, she would always become queen consort

    But the queen said in a message to mark her 70th year on the throne that it was her “sincere wish” Camilla should be known as queen consort when Charles becomes king, effectively giving her a seal of approval

    And although he is under no obligation to do so, he will likely become Charles III, making him the first king of that name to sit on the British throne since 1685

    ['queen', 'charles', 'become', 'king', 'percent']

    The speed at which the process moved convinced some at Brighton that Potter had been in Chelsea’s sights for some time

    Potter impressed in discussions with Chelsea owner Todd Boehly prior to being offered the job After saying his training ground farewells yesterday morning to Brighton’s players and staff, who were left saddened by his departure after just over three years at the Amex, Potter arrived at Chelsea’s Cobham HQ in the afternoon before his appointment was announced

    Manchester United have shown commendable character to recover from a nightmare start to the season in recent weeks, but their recent revival was snuffed out by Real Sociedad

    There are likely to be plenty of ups and downs for Manchester United under Ten Hag this season, but the meek manner of this defeat will have disappointed their new boss in the wake of their recent improvement

    It was not a night to remember for United's No.7 - who is now likely to revert back to the bench after failing to make the most of his chance to impress

  • OPERATION UNICORN: WHAT IS OPERATION UNICORN? WHAT HAPPENS AFTER THE QUEEN DIES IN SCOTLAND?

    https://www.edinburghnews.scotsman.com/news/national/operation-unicorn-what-is-operation-unicorn-what-happens-after-the-queen-dies-in-scotland-3836443

    09/09/2022, 03:04

    53.85% Shortened!

    As the Queen has died in Scotland, a plan known as Operation Unicorn will be implemented

    Following her death, the Monarch will be conveyed from Balmoral Castle in Aberdeenshire to Edinburgh, where she is to rest in state at the Palace of Holyroodhouse

    The Queen will then be transported to London, where her state funeral will take place

    Operation London Bridge is the primary plan for the Queen’s death, which will run in parallel with Operation Unicorn

    It sets out in detail what will happen in the 10 days between the Queen’s death and her state funeral

    Nicola Sturgeon pays tribute to Queen Elizabeth after her death Operation Spring Tide is the plan for the Prince of Wales' ascension to the throne, starting the day after the Queen’s death when he will be proclaimed the new king by the Accession Council at St James's Palace

    ['queen', 'elizabeth', 'day', 'operation', 'death']

    As the Queen has died in Scotland, a plan known as Operation Unicorn will be implemented

    Following her death, the Monarch will be conveyed from Balmoral Castle in Aberdeenshire to Edinburgh, where she is to rest in state at the Palace of Holyroodhouse

    The Queen will then be transported to London, where her state funeral will take place

    Operation London Bridge is the primary plan for the Queen’s death, which will run in parallel with Operation Unicorn

    It sets out in detail what will happen in the 10 days between the Queen’s death and her state funeral

    Nicola Sturgeon pays tribute to Queen Elizabeth after her death Operation Spring Tide is the plan for the Prince of Wales' ascension to the throne, starting the day after the Queen’s death when he will be proclaimed the new king by the Accession Council at St James's Palace

    ['queen', 'elizabeth', 'day', 'operation', 'death']



  • QUEEN ELIZABETH DIES PEACEFULLY AT SCOTTISH HOME, AGED 96

    https://www.malaysiakini.com/world/635142

    09/09/2022, 03:04

    66.67% Shortened!

    Queen Elizabeth, Britain's longest-reigning monarch and the nation's figurehead for seven decades, has died aged 96, Buckingham Palace said on Thursday

    "The queen died peacefully at Balmoral this afternoon," it said in a statement

    "The king and the queen consort will remain at Balmoral this evening and will return to London tomorrow." Elizabeth's eldest son Charles, 73, automatically becomes king of the United Kingdom and the head of state of 14 other realms including Australia, Canada and New Zealand

    His wife Camilla becomes queen consort

    Longest-serving head of state Queen Elizabeth II, who was also the world's oldest and longest-serving head of state, came to the throne following the death of her father King George VI on Feb 6, 1952, when she was just 25

    Elizabeth became monarch at a time when Britain still retained much of its old empire

    ['queen', 'elizabeth', 'britain', 'long', 'say']

  • HAPPYFRESH SEEMINGLY SUSPENDS OPERATIONS IN MALAYSIA

    https://www.lowyat.net/2022/283764/happyfresh-suspends-operations/

    09/08/2022, 23:13

    60.0% Shortened!

    The grocery delivery company HappyFresh has apparently temporarily suspended operations in Malaysia

    First sighted by Rnggt, a new notice under the HappyFresh app’s promotions tab states that all stores on its platform will be temporarily closed until it can “resolve the issue”

    The firm did not explain exactly what “issue” it was facing, neither does it provide a timeframe of when its services might be available again, only saying that it is taking the company longer than expected to resolve it

    When we tried to checkout an order through the app, no store had an available time slot for delivery and we were unable to make a purchase

    Founded in 2014, HappyFresh currently operates in Indonesia, Malaysia, and Thailand

    ©2022 LOWYAT MEDIA, LLC

    ['delivery', 'company', 'happyfresh', 'malaysia', 'store']

    The grocery delivery company HappyFresh has apparently temporarily suspended operations in Malaysia

    The firm did not explain exactly what “issue” it was facing, neither does it provide a timeframe of when its services might be available again, only saying that it is taking the company longer than expected to resolve it

    Founded in 2014, HappyFresh currently operates in Indonesia, Malaysia, and Thailand

  • IGP: CAN'T EXTRADITE JHO LOW BECAUSE NO COUNTRY HAS CONFIRMED HIS WHEREABOUTS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/08/igp-can039t-extradite-jho-low-because-no-country-has-confirmed-his-whereabouts

    09/08/2022, 23:04

    60.0% Shortened!

    "The police have also obtained a Red Notice from Interpol against Low in 2018

    "The notice could only be accessed by Interpol member countries as he did not pose a threat to public safety based on Interpol's assessment," he said in a statement on Thursday (Sept 8)

    "Interpol Red Notices issued act as a notification and a means to get information on the hunt of fugitives," he said adding that if any member country detects a wanted criminal there, Interpol there was responsible for relaying that information to the country which obtained the Red Notice for the extradition process

    He said so far extradition requests for Low could not be made because none of the Interpol member countries have confirmed his whereabouts in their respective countries

    "We welcome anyone who has information on the whereabouts of Low to contact the CCID infoline at 013-211 1222 via WhatsApp only or go to the nearest police station

    "Any information received would be checked for authenticity before it is forwarded to Interpol to get further verification from the respective member country," he said.

    ['low', 'interpol', 'member', 'country', 'police']

    "The police have also obtained a Red Notice from Interpol against Low in 2018

    "The notice could only be accessed by Interpol member countries as he did not pose a threat to public safety based on Interpol's assessment," he said in a statement on Thursday (Sept 8)

    "Interpol Red Notices issued act as a notification and a means to get information on the hunt of fugitives," he said adding that if any member country detects a wanted criminal there, Interpol there was responsible for relaying that information to the country which obtained the Red Notice for the extradition process

    He said so far extradition requests for Low could not be made because none of the Interpol member countries have confirmed his whereabouts in their respective countries

    "We welcome anyone who has information on the whereabouts of Low to contact the CCID infoline at 013-211 1222 via WhatsApp only or go to the nearest police station

    "Any information received would be checked for authenticity before it is forwarded to Interpol to get further verification from the respective member country," he said.

    ['low', 'interpol', 'member', 'country', 'police']

    "The longer inflation remains above [the Fed's 2%] target, the greater the risk that the public does begin to see higher inflation as the norm, and that has the capacity to really raise the cost of getting inflation down," Powell said

    His comments come after Fed vice chair Lael Brainard said on Wednesday that the central bank was dedicated to battling inflation "for as long as it takes." The Fed has already raised borrowing costs by 225 basis points since March

    ['britain', 'queen', 'elizabeth', 'balmoral', 'say']

    "The Queen died peacefully at Balmoral this afternoon," it said in a statement

    "The King and The Queen Consort will remain at Balmoral this evening and will return to London tomorrow." Elizabeth's eldest son Charles, 73, automatically becomes king of the United Kingdom and the head of state of 14 other realms including Australia, Canada and New Zealand

    His wife Camilla becomes Queen Consort

    Queen Elizabeth II, who was also the world's oldest and longest-serving head of state, came to the throne following the death of her father King George VI on Feb

    Elizabeth became monarch at a time when Britain still retained much of its old empire

    In the decades that followed, Elizabeth witnessed massive political change and social upheaval at home and abroad

    ['britain', 'queen', 'elizabeth', 'balmoral', 'say']



  • QATAR WARNS WORLD CUP FANS ABOUT SNEAKING ALCOHOL INTO COUNTRY

    https://africa.espn.com/football/fifa-world-cup/story/4741693/qatar-warns-world-cup-fans-over-sneaking-alcohol-into-country

    09/08/2022, 19:04

    50.0% Shortened!

    Fans travelling to the 2022 World Cup will not be able to take alcohol for personal consumption into Qatar, with the head of the country's safety and security committee saying that "specific measures" are in place to take action against anyone attempting to smuggle liquor in their luggage

    But despite football fan culture in many regions of the world involving alcohol consumption before, during and after games, the Qatari authorities have said that alcohol availability will be limited to designated areas only and that fans will not be allowed to bring their own booze

    "I think alcohol will not be allowed through the airport and suitcases

    "We are working like any other World Cup, like usual

    "Very simply, we have always stated that the sale of alcohol [will be] available in Qatar and will make it available in specific zones

    Later, the fans will have alcohol readily available."

    ['espn', 'fan', 'world', 'cup', 'alcohol']

    Fans travelling to the 2022 World Cup will not be able to take alcohol for personal consumption into Qatar, with the head of the country's safety and security committee saying that "specific measures" are in place to take action against anyone attempting to smuggle liquor in their luggage

    But despite football fan culture in many regions of the world involving alcohol consumption before, during and after games, the Qatari authorities have said that alcohol availability will be limited to designated areas only and that fans will not be allowed to bring their own booze

    "I think alcohol will not be allowed through the airport and suitcases

    "We are working like any other World Cup, like usual

    "Very simply, we have always stated that the sale of alcohol [will be] available in Qatar and will make it available in specific zones

    Later, the fans will have alcohol readily available."

  • RELIGIOUS OFFICER FACES 12 CHARGES OF RAPE, SEXUAL ABUSE AGAINST A CHILD

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/08/religious-officer-faces-12-charges-of-rape-sexual-abuse-against-a-child

    09/08/2022, 19:04

    56.25% Shortened!

    Thursday, 08 Sep 2022

    For the first three charges, the father of four is accused of allegedly raping the nine-year-old girl in a house at Taman Seri Kerayong in Jasin between 9am in September 2017 and the middle of the same month

    The charges are framed under Section 376, Section 377C and Section 376(2) of the Penal Code as well as Section 14(a) of the Sexual Offence Against Children 2017 read together under Section 16(1) and Section 17(1) of the same act

    The offences are punishable under Section 377C of the Penal Code which carries a punishment of maximum 20 years imprisonment and whipping upon conviction

    For the eighth to the 12th charges, the man is accused of allegedly raping and physically abusing the same victim at a house in Simpang Badak, Jasin between 2.30am on July 12, 2021 to June 13 this year

    The charges are framed under Section 14 (a) of the Sexual Offences Against Children Act 2017 which provides for imprisonment of up to 20 years and whipping, if convicted

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    Maybank, in a statement, said its SBR and BR would be increased from 2.25% per annum (p.a) to 2.50% p.a

    Similarly, the Islamic SBR and BR will be increased by 25 basis points from 2.25% p.a

    while the Islamic base financing rate will be increased from 5.90% p.a to 6.15% p.a

    In line with the revision, Maybank and Maybank Islamic’s fixed deposit rates will also be adjusted upwards effective Sept 12

    The last revision in Maybank’s Base Rate was on July 8 when it was increased from 2.00% p.a

    following an OPR increase by the same quantum

  • VIEW FROM ITALY: NAPOLI HAVE BEATEN LIVERPOOL BEFORE BUT NOT LIKE THIS

    https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-11192495/VIEW-ITALY-Napoli-beaten-Liverpool-not-like-this.html

    09/08/2022, 18:06

    85.71% Shortened!

    Napoli threatened to be - and turned out to be - Liverpool's worst nightmare.  Napoli produced an historical drubbing of Liverpool to open their Champions League group Fans are talking of nothing else today following a display that sent a warning to their rivals The Italian sports dailies were thrilled by Napoli's 4-1 victory over Liverpool on Wednesday Liverpool lost in Naples in 2018-19 and again in 2019-20, but this third defeat created an emotional earthquake that will never be forgotten

    'Napoli could have won 7-2 or 7-1 with how they played tonight.'  It is no exaggeration to say that Capello is right, and Klopp will know it, too.  LIVERPOOL LIKE A BOXER ON THE ROPES Liverpool lost the match in midfield with Harvey Elliott, James Milner and Fabinho wiped out by the physical and technical strength of Napoli.  Liverpool were like a boxer desperately clinging to the ropes of the ring, while the crowd urges the opponent not to show any mercy.  Napoli, meanwhile, were like a pinball machine, furiously moving the ball around at great speeds

    Make no mistake, though, Spalletti is building a force to be reckoned with.   SPALLETTI HUMILIATES KLOPP In the end this was as humiliating for Jurgen Klopp as it was his players.  Outclassed on the night

  • NAJIB GETS HEAT RASHES, COLD SHOWERS IN KAJANG PRISON, SAYS REPORT

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/08/najib-gets-heat-rashes-cold-showers-in-kajang-prison-says-report

    09/08/2022, 17:05

    68.42% Shortened!

    According to Utusan Malaysia, a source said that other than the former prime minister being placed in an isolation cell for his safety as a high-profile inmate, Najib was not being given any special treatment

    Najib is also allowed to exercise and participate in recreational activities according to prison rules

    Another source close to Najib told the daily that the Pekan MP has to bathe in cold water in his cell, which only has a single fan installed

    In fact, the source said Najib suffered rashes on his neck due to the heat in his cell

    “They have to use an extension wire for the machine,” the source told the daily

    Najib is not given access to special doctors and has to rely on existing doctors in prison, added the source

    ['najib', 'kajang', 'prison', 'say', 'report']

  • 1MDB TRIAL: NAJIB AUTHORISED NIK FAISAL TO HANDLE HIS AMISLAMIC CODE-NAMED ACCOUNTS, BUT TOLD BANK WILL STILL BE RESPONSIBLE IF MONEY MOVED OUT

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/08/1mdb-trial-najib-authorised-nik-faisal-to-handle-his-amislamic-code-named-accounts-but-told-bank-will-still-be-responsible-if-money-moved-out/27207

    09/08/2022, 17:05

    71.43% Shortened!

    AmIslamic bank’s Jalan Raja Chulan branch manager R

    The three code-named AmIslamic bank accounts are 211-202-201188-0 (AmPrivate Banking-1MY), 211-202-201189-8 (AmPrivate Banking-Y1MY) and 211-202-201190-6 (AmPrivate Banking-MY)

    Najib told the bank he was authorising Nik Faisal to carry out enquiry of the bank accounts’ status and details including the balance of money in the account, and to confirm cheques beyond the amount of RM250,000

    Najib instructed AmIslamic bank to clear and confirm all cheques up to the value of RM250,000 without checking with him or Nik Faisal

    In a June 20, 2013 letter to the same branch manager, Najib confirmed he had appointed Nik Faisal as his authorised personnel to handle his AmBank accounts (but without specifying any bank account) and authorised the latter to confirm the account status and details including account balance, to confirm cheques exceeding the sum of RM250,000, and to take cheque books and statements of account

    These three accounts are the same accounts that were given the code names AmPrivate Banking-1MY, AmPrivate Banking-Y1MY and AmPrivate Banking-MY

    ['najib', 'bank', 'account', 'authorise', 'nik']

  • BANK NEGARA RAISES OPR BY 25 BASIS POINTS TO 2.5%

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2022/09/08/bank-negara-raises-opr-by-25-basis-points-to-25

    09/08/2022, 16:06

    68.42% Shortened!

    This is the central bank's third consecutive rate hike, bringing the total increase in the OPR to 75bps so far this year

    "At the current OPR level, the stance of monetary policy continues to remain accommodative and supportive of economic growth

    "The MPC is not on any pre-set course and will continue to assess evolving conditions and their implications on the overall outlook to domestic inflation and growth," said Bank Negara.

    "Domestic liquidity remains sufficient, with continued orderly functioning of the financial and foreign exchange markets

    "Financial institutions also continue to operate with strong capital and liquidity buffers

    These will ensure financial intermediation remains supportive of the economy," it said

  • BANK NEGARA RAISES OPR BY 25BPS TO 2.5%, AS EXPECTED

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/article/bank-negara-raises-opr-25bps-25-expected

    09/08/2022, 16:06

    77.78% Shortened!

    At the current OPR level, the stance of monetary policy continues to remain accommodative and supportive of economic growth,” it said

    The OPR increase came as Malaysia’s 2022 gross domestic product (GDP) growth outlook also continued to improve, with Bloomberg consensus forecast raised to 6.8%, from 6.2% in August

    In its statement, BNM said the MPC is not on any pre-set course and will continue to assess evolving conditions and their implications on the overall outlook to domestic inflation and growth

    “Any adjustments to the monetary policy settings going forward would be done in a measured and gradual manner, ensuring that monetary policy remains accommodative to support a sustainable economic growth in an environment of price stability,” it said

    BNM said going forward, indicators point to continued growth, underpinned by support from private-sector spending

    Malaysia’s headline inflation rose 2.8% year-on-year in the second quarter, from 2.2% in 1Q2022

    ['say', 'growth', 'monetary', 'policy', 'opr']

    At the current OPR level, the stance of monetary policy continues to remain accommodative and supportive of economic growth,” it said

    The OPR increase came as Malaysia’s 2022 gross domestic product (GDP) growth outlook also continued to improve, with Bloomberg consensus forecast raised to 6.8%, from 6.2% in August

    In its statement, BNM said the MPC is not on any pre-set course and will continue to assess evolving conditions and their implications on the overall outlook to domestic inflation and growth

    “Any adjustments to the monetary policy settings going forward would be done in a measured and gradual manner, ensuring that monetary policy remains accommodative to support a sustainable economic growth in an environment of price stability,” it said

    BNM said going forward, indicators point to continued growth, underpinned by support from private-sector spending

    Malaysia’s headline inflation rose 2.8% year-on-year in the second quarter, from 2.2% in 1Q2022

  • MALAYSIA'S CENTRAL BANK HIKES KEY RATE AGAIN AS INFLATION RISK CLOUDS SUNNY OUTLOOK

    https://www.channelnewsasia.com/business/malaysia-inflation-central-bank-hikes-rate-third-straight-meeting-2927026

    09/08/2022, 16:04

    72.73% Shortened!

    The ringgit fell to a 24-year low on Wednesday, though it bounced back slightly on Thursday ahead of Bank Negara Malaysia's announcement

    File photo of Bank Negara Malaysia

    Bank Negara Malaysia raised its overnight policy rate by 25 basis points to 2.50 per cent, as expected by 19 of 20 economists polled by Reuters

    Consumer prices rose 4.4 per cent on an annual basis in July, quickening from June, with headline inflation averaging at 2.8 per cent this year

    BNM said underlying inflation, as measured by core inflation, was expected to average closer to the upper end of its range of 2 per cent to 3 per cent in 2022

    Malaysia's ringgit had fallen to a 24-year low on Wednesday, though had bounced back slightly on Thursday ahead of BNM's announcement

    ['bank', 'malaysia', 'inflation', 'per', 'cent']

  • IN COURT, BANK OFFICER CONFIRMS NAJIB ONLY PERSON WHO COULD SIGN CHEQUES FOR AMISLAMIC ACCOUNT WHICH PAID OUT RM8.4M

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/08/in-court-bank-officer-confirms-najib-only-person-who-could-sign-cheques-for-amislamic-account-which-paid-out-rm84m/27189

    09/08/2022, 15:06

    57.14% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Sept 8 — The High Court today heard that former prime minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak was the sole signatory for cheques from his AmIslamic bank account ending 9694

    Uma Devi confirmed that Najib had on January 13, 2011 opened the current account ending 9694 (full account number 211-202-200969-4) at the branch via an account opening form which he had signed, and that he had paid the minimum RM500 required to open the account

    “The authorised signatory for this personal account is Datuk Seri Najib Abdul Razak himself as the sole authorised signatory for cheques that are issued

    This means, only he alone can sign cheques and carry out matters through this account,” she told the High Court today

    Najib’s son Datuk Mohd Nizar was later spotted outside the courtroom’s area after the end of court proceedings today

    Yesterday and the day before, AmBank cheque processing centre’s senior manager Badrul Hisam Mohamad had as the 36th prosecution witness verified the 38 cheques issued from Najib’s AmIslamic bank account, with the amount confirmed to come up to a total of RM8,405,850 or over RM8.4 million

    ['today', 'najib', 'cheque', 'account', 'issue']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Sept 8 — The High Court today heard that former prime minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak was the sole signatory for cheques from his AmIslamic bank account ending 9694

    Uma Devi confirmed that Najib had on January 13, 2011 opened the current account ending 9694 (full account number 211-202-200969-4) at the branch via an account opening form which he had signed, and that he had paid the minimum RM500 required to open the account

    “The authorised signatory for this personal account is Datuk Seri Najib Abdul Razak himself as the sole authorised signatory for cheques that are issued

    This means, only he alone can sign cheques and carry out matters through this account,” she told the High Court today

    Najib’s son Datuk Mohd Nizar was later spotted outside the courtroom’s area after the end of court proceedings today

    Yesterday and the day before, AmBank cheque processing centre’s senior manager Badrul Hisam Mohamad had as the 36th prosecution witness verified the 38 cheques issued from Najib’s AmIslamic bank account, with the amount confirmed to come up to a total of RM8,405,850 or over RM8.4 million

  • FAHMI REZA’S MURAL ON HAZE PAINTED OVER AFTER JUST THREE DAYS (VIDEO)

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/life/2022/09/08/fahmi-rezas-mural-on-haze-painted-over-after-just-three-days-video/27181

    09/08/2022, 15:04

    53.85% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, September 8 — The black and yellow cautionary haze mural by artist activist Fahmi Reza at the side of Wisma Megah, Kuala Lumpur is gone after just three days

    The free-hand mural was initially painted by the local satirist last Sunday, bearing a warning as a means to create awareness on the potential return of haze due to open burnings

    Sekarang diorang tengah padam mural tu

    The 14-second clip which has garnered over 100,000 views was also retweeted on Fahmi’s Twitter account

    This mural was initially vandalised in less than 24 hours of its completion and again one day later

    The mural was aimed at Malaysian owned companies in Indonesia who were involved with open burning which was behind the regional haze in previous years

    ['haze', 'mural', 'fahmi', 'paint', 'twitter']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, September 8 — The black and yellow cautionary haze mural by artist activist Fahmi Reza at the side of Wisma Megah, Kuala Lumpur is gone after just three days

    The free-hand mural was initially painted by the local satirist last Sunday, bearing a warning as a means to create awareness on the potential return of haze due to open burnings

    Sekarang diorang tengah padam mural tu

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/08/new-route-to-be-built-in-melaka-to-link-malaysia-and-indonesia-says-state-exco

    09/08/2022, 14:04

    50.0% Shortened!

    Thursday, 08 Sep 2022

    Melaka investment, industry, entrepreneur development and cooperatives committee chairman Datuk Seri Ab Rauf Yusoh (pic) said the proposed development would take 20 years and when completed would have a major impact on the economic development of both countries

    "On the part of the state government, we have brought all government agencies to visit the area where the proposed new route will be built," he told reporters after an interview on the "Apa Khabar YB” programme with Melakafm here on Thursday (Sept 8) Ab Rauf said the project, to be built using the concept 'One Belt One Road', would be a new icon for Malaysia and Indonesia

    Apart from that, he said, a new industrial site that would house various activities would be developed in stages in Masjid Tanah in an area covering about 2,023 ha

    Development of the area would be carried out by the Melaka Corporation and wass expected to also contribute to the opening of a new town in Masjid Tanah, he added

    We would love to keep you posted on the latest promotion

    The other two judges on the bench were Datuk Hadhariah Syed Ismail and Datuk Seri Mariana Yahya.court is scheduled to hear the Baling MP’s appeal against the Penang High Court’s decision, made on Nov 12, 2020, which dismissed his suit against the former Penang Chief Minister in connection with the construction of the Penang undersea tunnel project

    Counsel Datuk Porres Royan appeared for Abdul Azeez while Lim was represented by lawyer N.Mureli

    Abdul Azeez filed the suit in March 2018, claiming that Lim, who was then the Finance Minister, had issued defamatory statements during a press conference at the Penang Chief Minister’s office on Feb 28, 2018, and during a Chinese New Year open house hosted by the Penang Development Corporation on the same day, connecting him ( Abdul Azeez) with a payment of RM3 million in consultation fee by the developer of the undersea tunnel project

  • WILL NAJIB GET A PARDON? EX-CHIEF JUSTICE HAMID SAYS ANWAR’S CASE SETS A PRECEDENT FOR CONVICTS

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/08/will-najib-get-a-pardon-ex-chief-justice-hamid-says-anwars-case-sets-a-precedent-for-convicts/27138

    09/08/2022, 12:06

    57.14% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Sept 8 — Retired top judge Tun Abdul Hamid Mohamad has indicated that Malaysia’s legal and judicial systems would become an international laughing stock if convicted former prime minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak were to receive a pardon, Utusan Malaysia reported today

    The former chief justice from 2007 to 2008 noted that the Federal Constitution is silent on the grounds for a convicted criminal to receive a pardon, but added that the 2018 full pardon granted to PKR president Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim has set a precedent

    “The case of Pakatan Harapan chairman Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim has changed that practice

    The grounds for Anwar to get a pardon was only political,” Abdul Hamid was quoted as saying

    He added that the question on whether or not Najib should receive a pardon has been politicised

    A royal pardon falls under Article 42(1) of the Federal Constitution, which gives the Agong or Sultan the powers to grant a pardon or reprieve to a convict.

    ['abdul', 'hamid', 'former', 'datuk', 'seri']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Sept 8 — Retired top judge Tun Abdul Hamid Mohamad has indicated that Malaysia’s legal and judicial systems would become an international laughing stock if convicted former prime minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak were to receive a pardon, Utusan Malaysia reported today

    The former chief justice from 2007 to 2008 noted that the Federal Constitution is silent on the grounds for a convicted criminal to receive a pardon, but added that the 2018 full pardon granted to PKR president Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim has set a precedent

    “The case of Pakatan Harapan chairman Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim has changed that practice

    The grounds for Anwar to get a pardon was only political,” Abdul Hamid was quoted as saying

    He added that the question on whether or not Najib should receive a pardon has been politicised

    A royal pardon falls under Article 42(1) of the Federal Constitution, which gives the Agong or Sultan the powers to grant a pardon or reprieve to a convict.

    ['abdul', 'hamid', 'former', 'datuk', 'seri']



  • GUAN ENG LABELS HADI A ‘CLEAR AND PRESENT DANGER’ TO MALAYSIAN UNITY

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/08/guan-eng-labels-hadi-a-clear-and-present-danger-to-malaysian-unity/27145

    09/08/2022, 12:06

    64.71% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Sept 8 — The government must take action against PAS president Tan Sri Abdul Hadi Awang over his accusation that non-Muslims and non-Bumiputera are the “roots of corruption” in the country, said DAP national chairman Lim Guan Eng

    Lim stressed that this must be done as Hadi’s racial remarks pose a “clear and present danger” to the unity between Malaysians, while at the same time, sending a clear message that corruption is colour- and religion-blind

    “The government must take action against Abdul Hadi Awang to prove that corruption is colour-blind and disprove his racist and extremist remarks non-Bumis and non-Muslims are the root of corruption in Malaysia

    Zuhdi yesterday cited a survey which found that between 2010 and 2014, 88 per cent of 449 people who were convicted of giving bribes were non-Malays

    “Clearly, Zuhdi is just as racist and extremist as Abdul Hadi

    Hadi sparked national uproar for a statement posted on his official Facebook page on August 20 in which he said corruption stemmed from those who reaped profit through illegal means, adding that the majority of those involved in ruining the country’s politics and economy were non-Muslims and non-Bumiputera

    ['hadi', 'non', 'corruption', 'say', 'zuhdi']

    79.31% Shortened!

    Buatin with his certificate of completion after conquering Mount Kinabalu

    Recently, the former Sabah State Railway Department employee broke a record he "accidentally" created in 2015, by once again becoming the nation’s oldest man to scale Mount Kinabalu when he was 83

    “Back in 2015, I climbed Mount Kinabalu and after returning home, I found that news of me successfully completing the hike as the oldest Malaysian was in almost every local newspaper,” Buatin said

    He also did a body and health examination prior to that just to certify that he was fit enough to do the climb

    Buatin also welcomed anyone who wishes to challenge his record, and just get out of their comfort zone

    https://www.malaysiakini.com/news/635031

    09/08/2022, 09:04

    75.0% Shortened!

    First of all, you must remember pardon in Malaysia is set out in Article 42 of the Federal Constitution and it is perilous to compare it to other countries, as it is a unique Malaysian mechanism

    All 50,000 of them are entitled to apply for pardon, under Article 42

    Essentially, you have to serve one-third of your jail sentence before you apply

    It is just being practical

    So the first problem is how do you become one of the 50

    Let’s next consider what happens when...

    ['najib', 'pardon', 'let', 'problem', 'would']

    First of all, you must remember pardon in Malaysia is set out in Article 42 of the Federal Constitution and it is perilous to compare it to other countries, as it is a unique Malaysian mechanism

    All 50,000 of them are entitled to apply for pardon, under Article 42

    Essentially, you have to serve one-third of your jail sentence before you apply

    It is just being practical

    So the first problem is how do you become one of the 50

    Let’s next consider what happens when...

    https://www.thestar.com.my/sport/badminton/2022/09/08/pearly-wont-push-it

    09/08/2022, 08:04

    Pearly had picked up the injury while playing in the second round of the Japan Open along with partner M

    I have to take good care for this injury to heal

    “I hope my condition on court will be good when I play in my next tournament,” said Pearly

    The next tournaments scheduled for Pearly and Thinaah are the Denmark Open (Oct 18-23) and French Open (Oct 25-30) but their participation depends on whether the former will be able to fully recover in time

    Pearly-Thinaah, who are currently ranked No

    11 in the world, will be hoping to continue their good form before the injury setback when they return to action

    ['pearly', 'recover', 'fully', 'injury', 'open']

    Pearly had picked up the injury while playing in the second round of the Japan Open along with partner M

    I have to take good care for this injury to heal

    “I hope my condition on court will be good when I play in my next tournament,” said Pearly

    The next tournaments scheduled for Pearly and Thinaah are the Denmark Open (Oct 18-23) and French Open (Oct 25-30) but their participation depends on whether the former will be able to fully recover in time

  • THE WAR IS NOT OVER, ESPECIALLY FOR SENIORS

    09/08/2022, 08:04

    72.73% Shortened!

    Seniors, especially those with comorbidities, still need to mask up and abide by Covid-19 hygiene measures, said Malaysia Coalition on Ageing president Cheah Tuck Wing

    Malaysia Shopping Malls Association president Tan Sri Teo Chiang Kok said they would encourage their members to advise retailers and patrons to mask up

    Poh said people should be responsible and mask up if they are symptomatic or feeling unwell

    “I think it’s time we accept this (not wearing masks) as we know all the necessary precautions

    “If people get infected, we already know how to handle it

    “It’s time for us to get back to our normal life,” he said

    Besides the IGP, the other named as defendants in the suit are the police, the Home Ministry and the government

    There was no error by the High Court in its decision to dismiss the striking-out application brought by the IGP and three others, she said, adding that there was no merit in the government’s appeal

    Pathmanathan, as ordered by the Federal Court on April 29, 2016

    The Ipoh High Court in 2010 granted full custody of the children to Indira Gandhi

    In 2016, the Federal Court affirmed the mandamus order issued by the High Court directing the police and the appellants to apprehend Muhammad Riduan and retrieve Prasana Diksa to be returned to Indira Gandhi

  • GOVT AGENCIES, POLITICAL PARTIES THE MOST ACTIVE IN SPREADING DISINFORMATION, NEW STUDY FINDS

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/08/govt-agencies-political-parties-the-most-active-in-spreading-disinformation-new-study-finds/26994

    09/08/2022, 08:04

    83.33% Shortened!

    James Gomez, Asia Centre’s regional director, in a statement accompanying the report’s launch warned that the disinformation campaign is set to intensify in the run-up and during the 15th general election (GE15) that must be held by September 2023

    Asia Centre said disinformation against Anwar continued from 1999 up until the Port Dickson by-election on October 13, 2018, which the PKR president eventually won

    Disinformation by both sides The study found that this type of disinformation was also perpetrated by the Opposition

    “Political disinformation on corruption has been primarily used to discredit the government or attack political rivals during the past elections

    Government, parties major disinformation actors Asia Centre said its study pointed to government agencies, political parties or campaign managers as the set of actors at the top of the disinformation chain as they directed the creation and spread of fake news

    “These actors commission disinformation to dispel criticism, discredit political opponents, and manipulate information flow and public opinion

    ['campaign', 'election', 'disinformation', 'political', 'study']

    James Gomez, Asia Centre’s regional director, in a statement accompanying the report’s launch warned that the disinformation campaign is set to intensify in the run-up and during the 15th general election (GE15) that must be held by September 2023

    Asia Centre said disinformation against Anwar continued from 1999 up until the Port Dickson by-election on October 13, 2018, which the PKR president eventually won

    Disinformation by both sides The study found that this type of disinformation was also perpetrated by the Opposition

    “Political disinformation on corruption has been primarily used to discredit the government or attack political rivals during the past elections

  • MASKS CAN COME OFF INDOORS NOW

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/08/masks-can-come-off-indoors-now

    09/08/2022, 08:04

    70.0% Shortened!

    “The use of face masks indoors is now optional

    “If the owners of the premises decide to impose a face mask ruling on patrons, the visitors must abide by it

    Malaysia made it mandatory for the public to wear face masks on Aug 1, 2020

    After the country announced the transition to endemicity this year, the requirement for face masks outdoors was removed on May 1

    While mask use indoors is optional, Khairy said the ministry still encouraged face masks to be worn in crowded areas like night markets, stadiums, shopping malls and places of worship

    “Individuals doing activities with high-risk groups like the elderly and children are also advised to put on face masks,” added Khairy

    ['face', 'mask', 'public', 'use', 'khairy']

    “The use of face masks indoors is now optional

    “If the owners of the premises decide to impose a face mask ruling on patrons, the visitors must abide by it

    After the country announced the transition to endemicity this year, the requirement for face masks outdoors was removed on May 1

    While mask use indoors is optional, Khairy said the ministry still encouraged face masks to be worn in crowded areas like night markets, stadiums, shopping malls and places of worship

    Arsenal did it a couple of times, but in the end, they didn't manage to make the final pass to score.  We're now seeing how the manager wants them to play and the philosophy so it's not always easy, he's done well to turn it around "So, in general the team are doing quite well defensively, but there will always be teams who have the quality to play through it

    "It's good for the manager and very important for the team to make a change, especially after a start like that

    "We're now seeing how the manager wants them to play and the philosophy so it's not always easy, he's done well to turn it around and make changes within the team

    To see all content on The Sun, please use the Site Map

    ['also', 'change', 'play', 'well', 'make']

    09/07/2022

    81.25% Shortened!

    Get out of the water! A water surge is likely to happen

    Water surges are common during the rainy season

    “Some do not notice the early signs of a water surge

    I quickly informed my friends and we got out of the water just in time

    I normally go to these places with my brother or my husband, to be on the safe side,” said Amirah, who had experienced a water surge when she was just nine

    He too had experienced a water surge in 2014

    ['water', 'current', 'strong', 'get', 'surge']

    But what I’ve seen from him up until this point, especially with the last two goals he’s scored, is somebody that thinks “If I’m going through, I’m scoring”.'   • SHAHRIR SAMAD TRIAL: RM118,000 CHEQUE DEPOSITED INTO CAR COMPANY'S BANK ACCOUNT, SAYS WITNESS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/2022/09/07/shahrir-samad-trial-rm118000-cheque-deposited-into-car-company039s-bank-account-says-witness

    09/07/2022, 21:05

    71.43% Shortened!

    Public Bank Berhad banking services manager at the Taman Sentosa Branch in Johor Bahru, Seah Yeow Hwee, 59, said that based on a copy of the bank statement, there was an incoming transaction in the account on Dec 27, 2013

    "I confirm that this is an image copy of a Public Islamic Bank cheque in the name of Sutera Auto Sdn Bhd amounting to RM118,485.00 dated Dec 21, 2013

    Based on the stamp on the back of the cheque, I confirm that this cheque was deposited into the Public Bank account in the name of Sutera Auto Sdn Bhd," he said

    The prosecution, in its opening statement, had said that it would prove that Shahrir was directly involved in money laundering activities when he obtained money amounting to RM1mil from Najib and deposited it into his Public Islamic bank account through a cheque dated Nov 27, 2013

    Meanwhile, Seah, who has served at Public Bank Berhad for 38 years, agreed with Shahrir's counsel, Syahrul Syazwan Salehin, that based on a copy of the cheque and bank statement, the RM118,485 transaction took place without any problems

    Shahrir, 72, is accused of money laundering by not stating his real income in the Income Tax Return Form for Assessment Year 2013, namely the RM1 million received through a cheque from Najib, believed to be from unlawful activities, which violates Section 113(1)(a) of the Income Tax Act 1967

    ['shahrir', 'cheque', 'public', 'bank', 'statement']

    Public Bank Berhad banking services manager at the Taman Sentosa Branch in Johor Bahru, Seah Yeow Hwee, 59, said that based on a copy of the bank statement, there was an incoming transaction in the account on Dec 27, 2013

    "I confirm that this is an image copy of a Public Islamic Bank cheque in the name of Sutera Auto Sdn Bhd amounting to RM118,485.00 dated Dec 21, 2013

    Based on the stamp on the back of the cheque, I confirm that this cheque was deposited into the Public Bank account in the name of Sutera Auto Sdn Bhd," he said

    The prosecution, in its opening statement, had said that it would prove that Shahrir was directly involved in money laundering activities when he obtained money amounting to RM1mil from Najib and deposited it into his Public Islamic bank account through a cheque dated Nov 27, 2013

    Meanwhile, Seah, who has served at Public Bank Berhad for 38 years, agreed with Shahrir's counsel, Syahrul Syazwan Salehin, that based on a copy of the cheque and bank statement, the RM118,485 transaction took place without any problems

  • THE DOMINO EFFECT OF LIVERPOOL’S MIDFIELD ISSUES – AND POSSIBLE SOLUTIONS

    https://www.thisisanfield.com/2022/09/the-domino-effect-of-liverpools-midfield-issues-and-possible-solutions/

    09/07/2022

    87.27% Shortened!

    The concern for Liverpool going into this season was midfield

    It didn’t just affect our season, it torpedoed it

    For whatever reason (and it’s supposition on any of our parts to know exactly why), no midfield signings occurred

    As we all know, the midfield is the ‘engine room’ of any team

    This midfield approach of giving the opposition little to no time on the ball has the added benefit of offering our defence superior protection as the opposition midfield is forced further back leaving their attackers without adequate support

    I believe there are reasons for this outside ‘form’ of each player and are exacerbated by the current midfield situation

    Just how Klopp chooses to address the current midfield conundrum is unknown at this point, but I feel it is likely to have a major impact on how successful this season might be

    ['season', 'midfield', 'game', 'option', 'back']

  • PM CONGRATULATES SAM LIM, PROUD TO HEAR MALAY SPOKEN IN AUSTRALIAN PARLIAMENT

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/07/pm-congratulates-sam-lim-proud-to-hear-malay-spoken-in-australian-parliament

    09/07/2022, 20:05

    57.14% Shortened!

    In a tweet, the Prime Minister also said he was proud when Lim spoke in the Malay language in his maiden speech at the Australian Parliament on Wednesday (Sept 7)

    "Bahasa Melayu is heard in Australian Parliament! I am proud to see Bahasa Melayu being elevated in the world stage by @SamLimMP when delivering his inaugural speech in the Australian parliament

    Lim, 61, from Australian Labor Party (ALP) was appointed as an MP after winning the Tangey seat in Perth in the general election in Australia recently

    In his speech, Lim expressed his appreciation of Malaysians for their support

    Lim who was born in 1961, had served as a policeman in Malaysia for two years from 1983 before working as a dolphin trainer as well as operating businesses in Malaysia and Australia

    He, his wife with three children later migrated to Australia and he joined the Western Australia Police Academy in 2006 before serving in Perth

    ['born', 'lim', 'australia', 'speech', 'australian']

  • HEALTH MINISTRY CONSIDERING PURCHASING OMICRON-SPECIFIC COVID-19 VACCINE

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/07/health-ministry-considering-purchasing-omicron-specific-covid-19-vaccine

    09/07/2022, 20:05

    53.85% Shortened!

    Wednesday, 07 Sep 2022

    Health Minister Khairy Jamaluddin said, however, the ministry has yet to decide on the immunisation programme that will be implemented if it offers the vaccine

    We have yet to decide whether to offer the vaccine to everyone, or only to those who are at high risk

    Last month, Britain approved a variant-specific Covid-19 vaccine produced by the United States pharmaceutical company, Moderna, as a booster for adults

    Meanwhile, Khairy said the MOH’s Technical Working Group (TWG) on Aug 3 recommended the administration of a second booster dose of the messenger RNA (mRNA) vaccine for pregnant or breastfeeding women, in line with the World Health Organisation (WHO) recommendation

    Khairy said the TWG also recommended giving the first vaccine booster to children aged five to under 12; COVID-19 vaccination for children aged between six months and five years and heterologous vaccination for the second booster dose, adding that a heterologous vaccine with mRNA vaccine or viral vector vaccine for the second booster dose can be administered to individuals who are at high risk of developing serious illnesses due to Covid-19

    ['health', 'variant', 'covid', 'vaccine', 'khairy']

    Wednesday, 07 Sep 2022

    Health Minister Khairy Jamaluddin said, however, the ministry has yet to decide on the immunisation programme that will be implemented if it offers the vaccine

    We have yet to decide whether to offer the vaccine to everyone, or only to those who are at high risk

    Last month, Britain approved a variant-specific Covid-19 vaccine produced by the United States pharmaceutical company, Moderna, as a booster for adults

    Meanwhile, Khairy said the MOH’s Technical Working Group (TWG) on Aug 3 recommended the administration of a second booster dose of the messenger RNA (mRNA) vaccine for pregnant or breastfeeding women, in line with the World Health Organisation (WHO) recommendation

    Khairy said the TWG also recommended giving the first vaccine booster to children aged five to under 12; COVID-19 vaccination for children aged between six months and five years and heterologous vaccination for the second booster dose, adding that a heterologous vaccine with mRNA vaccine or viral vector vaccine for the second booster dose can be administered to individuals who are at high risk of developing serious illnesses due to Covid-19

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/world/2022/09/07/putin-threatens-to-halt-energy-supplies-czechs-get-cold-feet-on-price-cap

    09/07/2022, 19:05

    81.25% Shortened!

    Russia blames those sanctions for causing the gas supply problems, which it puts down to pipeline faults

    The EU however plans to press ahead with a price cap on Russian gas and also a ceiling on the price paid for electricity from generators that do not run on gas

    "We will propose a price cap on Russian gas..

    The Netherlands, which has consistently opposed a gas price cap, would support one that targets Russian gas, a source with knowledge of the matter told Reuters on Wednesday

    "We will not supply gas, oil, coal, heating oil - we will not supply anything," Putin said

    Europe usually imports about 40% of its gas and 30% of its oil from Russia

    And supporters took to Twitter to express their anger at Ziyech’s refusal to let James take the late free-kick

  • KHAIRY: FACE MASKS INDOORS OPTIONAL FROM TODAY ONWARDS BUT SUBJECT TO PREMISE OWNERS’ DISCRETION

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/07/khairy-face-masks-indoors-optional-from-today-onwards-but-subject-to-premise-owners-discretion/27009

    09/07/2022, 18:05

    53.85% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Sept 7 — Wearing face masks indoors will not be mandatory from today, said Health Minister Khairy Jamaluddin

    “Since May 2022 it was a must to wear mask indoors and in e-hailing

    “However, the premise owner can decide if patrons need or don’t need to wear face masks

    “If they ask you to wear one then you must adhere to their wish and they have the right to refuse your entry,” Khairy said today

    Previously, masking outdoors was made optional from May 1 as part of the country’s shift towards treating Covid-19 as an endemic disease

    Still, the minister advised Malaysians to remain vigilant against infection and to mask up as a precaution when entering settings with large crowds

    ['wear', 'mask', 'say', 'health', 'covid']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Sept 7 — Wearing face masks indoors will not be mandatory from today, said Health Minister Khairy Jamaluddin

    “Since May 2022 it was a must to wear mask indoors and in e-hailing

    “However, the premise owner can decide if patrons need or don’t need to wear face masks

    “If they ask you to wear one then you must adhere to their wish and they have the right to refuse your entry,” Khairy said today

    Previously, masking outdoors was made optional from May 1 as part of the country’s shift towards treating Covid-19 as an endemic disease

    Still, the minister advised Malaysians to remain vigilant against infection and to mask up as a precaution when entering settings with large crowds

  • FORMER TABUNG HAJI CHAIRMAN ABDUL AZEEZ SUBMITS ANOTHER REPRESENTATION TO DROP CORRUPTION, MONEY LAUNDERING CHARGES

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/07/former-tabung-haji-chairman-abdul-azeez-submits-another-representation-to-drop-corruption-money-laundering-charges/27019

    09/07/2022, 18:05

    66.67% Shortened!

    “The representation was received by the prosecution on September 5, nonetheless it has not been brought to the attention of the attorney general

    Even though the issues submitted in the representation were the same as the earlier representation, the prosecution needs to obtain instruction from the attorney general on the representation,” she said during the mention of the case before Sessions Court Judge Azura Alwi

    “I understand that they (prosecution) are still studying the representation

    Azura set September 23 for the mention of the case to know the status of the representation and will set a new hearing date if the representation is rejected

    On September 5, Abdul Azeez failed in his appeal at the Court of Appeal to overturn the three charges of corruption and six charges of money laundering he was facing

    For the charge of money laundering, the accused is charged in accordance with Section 4(1)(b) of the Anti-Money Laundering, Anti-Terrorist Financing and Proceeds of Unlawful Activities Act (AMLATFPUAA) 2001 which is punishable under Section 4(1) of the same act

    ['money', 'laundering', 'charge', 'court', 'appeal']

    “The representation was received by the prosecution on September 5, nonetheless it has not been brought to the attention of the attorney general

    Even though the issues submitted in the representation were the same as the earlier representation, the prosecution needs to obtain instruction from the attorney general on the representation,” she said during the mention of the case before Sessions Court Judge Azura Alwi

    “I understand that they (prosecution) are still studying the representation

    Azura set September 23 for the mention of the case to know the status of the representation and will set a new hearing date if the representation is rejected

    For the charge of money laundering, the accused is charged in accordance with Section 4(1)(b) of the Anti-Money Laundering, Anti-Terrorist Financing and Proceeds of Unlawful Activities Act (AMLATFPUAA) 2001 which is punishable under Section 4(1) of the same act

  • SOCCER-CHELSEA SACK TUCHEL AFTER CHAMPIONS LEAGUE DEFEAT TO ZAGREB

    https://www.thestar.com.my/sport/football/2022/09/07/soccer-chelsea-sack-tuchel-after-champions-league-defeat-to-zagreb

    09/07/2022, 18:02

    73.91% Shortened!

    The Premier League club confirmed on its website that they had parted company with the German coach who guided Chelsea to Champions League glory in his first season

    "On behalf of everyone at Chelsea FC, the Club would like to place on record its gratitude to Thomas and his staff for all their efforts during their time with the Club," the club said

    "Thomas will rightly have a place in Chelsea's history after winning the Champions League, the Super Cup and Club World Cup in his time here." While Chelsea have not started the season especially well, having lost two of their opening six Premier League games, Tuchel's exit is still a surprising move

    Under Tuchel Chelsea also won the UEFA Super Cup and FIFA Club World Cup last season

    Tuchel leaves with a win percentage of 60% but Chelsea won only seven of their last 16 Premier League matches and the new owners clearly felt it was a trend that could not continue

    "Chelsea's coaching staff will take charge of the team for training and the preparation of our upcoming matches as the Club moves swiftly to appoint a new head coach," the club said

    ['cup', 'chelsea', 'tuchel', 'league', 'premier']

    The Premier League club confirmed on its website that they had parted company with the German coach who guided Chelsea to Champions League glory in his first season

    "On behalf of everyone at Chelsea FC, the Club would like to place on record its gratitude to Thomas and his staff for all their efforts during their time with the Club," the club said

    "Thomas will rightly have a place in Chelsea's history after winning the Champions League, the Super Cup and Club World Cup in his time here." While Chelsea have not started the season especially well, having lost two of their opening six Premier League games, Tuchel's exit is still a surprising move

    Under Tuchel Chelsea also won the UEFA Super Cup and FIFA Club World Cup last season

    Tuchel leaves with a win percentage of 60% but Chelsea won only seven of their last 16 Premier League matches and the new owners clearly felt it was a trend that could not continue

    "Chelsea's coaching staff will take charge of the team for training and the preparation of our upcoming matches as the Club moves swiftly to appoint a new head coach," the club said

    ['cup', 'chelsea', 'tuchel', 'league', 'premier']



  • UN EXPERTS DENOUNCE MALAYSIA'S GENDER-DISCRIMINATORY CITIZENSHIP LAW

    https://www.thestar.com.my/lifestyle/family/2022/09/07/un-experts-denounce-malaysia039s-gender-discriminatory-citizenship-law

    09/07/2022

    62.5% Shortened!

    Wednesday, 07 Sep 2022

    After the high court decision in Sep 2021, a few mothers were successful in getting citizenships for their children born abroad

    The decision, says the UN in a press statement released on Sept 5, contravenes Malaysia’s obligations under international law and "the need to interpret all constitutional provisions concerning citizenship, and its transference, without discrimination based on sex"

    In August 2022, the Court of Appeal overturned a landmark 2021 High Court ruling which would have allowed Malaysian mothers married to foreign spouses the right to pass down citizenship to children born abroad

    “When children of Malaysian descent are banned from being part of society based on a discriminatory interpretation of the law, it does not only negatively impact them, but the community and State lose the opportunity to thrive socially, politically and economically." On Sep 9, 2021, the High Court ruled that the word “father” in paragraphs 1(b) and 1(c) of Part II of Second Schedule of the Federal Constitution shall be interpreted harmoniously to include “mother” and that overseas-born children of Malaysian women are citizens by “operation of law." However, on 5 August 2022, the Court of Appeal ruled in favour of the Government’s appeal, declaring that the relevant provisions of the Constitution specifically refer to the “biological father” and cannot be extended to mean the “mother." “We regret that the Malaysian Government is responsible for this setback instead of seizing an opportunity to make progress towards the realisation of gender equality

    We call on the Government to fulfil its obligations under the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination against Women and the Convention on the Rights of the Child by interpreting the law to ensure there is no contradiction between Article 14(1)b and Article 8(2) of the Federal Constitution, as amended by Parliament to prohibit discrimination against citizens based on descent, place of birth or gender in any law,” the UN experts said.

    ['court', 'mother', 'citizenship', 'child', 'malaysian']

    Wednesday, 07 Sep 2022

    After the high court decision in Sep 2021, a few mothers were successful in getting citizenships for their children born abroad

    The decision, says the UN in a press statement released on Sept 5, contravenes Malaysia’s obligations under international law and "the need to interpret all constitutional provisions concerning citizenship, and its transference, without discrimination based on sex"

    In August 2022, the Court of Appeal overturned a landmark 2021 High Court ruling which would have allowed Malaysian mothers married to foreign spouses the right to pass down citizenship to children born abroad

    “When children of Malaysian descent are banned from being part of society based on a discriminatory interpretation of the law, it does not only negatively impact them, but the community and State lose the opportunity to thrive socially, politically and economically." On Sep 9, 2021, the High Court ruled that the word “father” in paragraphs 1(b) and 1(c) of Part II of Second Schedule of the Federal Constitution shall be interpreted harmoniously to include “mother” and that overseas-born children of Malaysian women are citizens by “operation of law." However, on 5 August 2022, the Court of Appeal ruled in favour of the Government’s appeal, declaring that the relevant provisions of the Constitution specifically refer to the “biological father” and cannot be extended to mean the “mother." “We regret that the Malaysian Government is responsible for this setback instead of seizing an opportunity to make progress towards the realisation of gender equality

    We call on the Government to fulfil its obligations under the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination against Women and the Convention on the Rights of the Child by interpreting the law to ensure there is no contradiction between Article 14(1)b and Article 8(2) of the Federal Constitution, as amended by Parliament to prohibit discrimination against citizens based on descent, place of birth or gender in any law,” the UN experts said.

    ['court', 'mother', 'citizenship', 'child', 'malaysian']

    09/07/2022

    68.42% Shortened!

    Indira Gandhi should be dealt by way of a trial

    Besides the IGP, the other named as defendants in the suit are the police, the Home Ministry and the government

    There was no error by the High Court in its decision to dismiss the striking-out application brought by the IGP and three others, she said, adding that there was no merit in the government's appeal

    Pathmanathan, as ordered by the Federal Court on April 29, 2016

    The Ipoh High Court in 2010 granted full custody of the children to Indira Gandhi

    In 2016, the Federal Court affirmed the mandamus order issued by the High Court directing the police and the appellants to apprehend Muhammad Riduan and retrieve Prasana Diksa to be returned to Indira Gandhi

  • MP SPEAKS | FROM PARTY OF INDEPENDENCE FIGHTERS TO KLEPTOCRATS

    https://www.malaysiakini.com/columns/634888

    09/07/2022

    68.42% Shortened!

    After over six decades of Independence, it would be difficult to find an Umno division leader who is not a millionaire.” The fifth Umno president believed that Umno is beyond redemption

    Is the fifth Umno president right that Umno is beyond saving and that the only way to end the corruption perpetrated by Umno leaders is to kill Umno off entirely? The 15th General Election (GE15) will decide whether Umno can cease to be a party of kleptocrats and whether Malaysia will continue in the trajectory of a kleptocracy

    Up to now, neither Umno nor any major Umno leader has ever condemned the RM50 billion 1MDB financial scandal or the string of mega scandals which plague the country

    Can Umno be saved to ensure that Malaysia can be saved? Or Umno cannot be saved but Malaysia can be saved

    I say that Umno-BN would lose GE15 if held within the next few months if Umno cannot convince the voters that it has changed and is no more a party of kleptocrats

    Zahid is right that there is only one cluster in charge in Umno

    ['umno', 'party', 'would', 'leader', 'scandal']

  • WHERE ASIA'S RICH ARE PUTTING THEIR CASH AS GLOBAL RISKS GROW

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2022/09/07/where-asia039s-rich-are-putting-their-cash-as-global-risks-grow

    09/07/2022, 16:05

    72.73% Shortened!

    Wednesday, 07 Sep 2022

    People with more than US$1 million of investable funds are repositioning toward private markets to shield their assets from market volatility, Lombard Odier’s 2022 study about high net-worth individuals in Asia Pacific found

    The surge in inflation and its repercussions on the global economy are the biggest concern for 77% of the people polled, Lombard Odier said

    Half of them are worried about market volatility, which has pushed as much as 56% of them to increase diversification

    The rich in Singapore and Australia are leading the trend, with about 60% of them planning to increase their allocations to private markets

    "The concern of lack of visibility, volatility and the willingness to manage it are homogeneous across the markets and across age brackets,” said Jean-Francois Aboulker, the bank’s Asia head of ultra-high net-worth individuals.

    ['asset', 'concern', 'market', 'volatility', 'asia']

    Wednesday, 07 Sep 2022

    People with more than US$1 million of investable funds are repositioning toward private markets to shield their assets from market volatility, Lombard Odier’s 2022 study about high net-worth individuals in Asia Pacific found

    The surge in inflation and its repercussions on the global economy are the biggest concern for 77% of the people polled, Lombard Odier said

    Half of them are worried about market volatility, which has pushed as much as 56% of them to increase diversification

    The rich in Singapore and Australia are leading the trend, with about 60% of them planning to increase their allocations to private markets

    "The concern of lack of visibility, volatility and the willingness to manage it are homogeneous across the markets and across age brackets,” said Jean-Francois Aboulker, the bank’s Asia head of ultra-high net-worth individuals.

    In Singapore, foodpanda has about 37 per cent of the market share in the food delivery sector, and had more than 10,000 delivery workers here on its platform at the start of last year

    The other major player, Grab, has more than 50 per cent of the market share.

    The victim, who only wanted to be known as Tay, 53, said that the shop was also plastered with wanted posters of a former employee of the shop, who has not worked there since 2014

    Tay believes a loan shark who also left contact information on the posters was responsible for that act

    He left the shop eight years ago

    "We contacted the loan shark to tell them that Cheah was no longer here and asked them not to bother the shop

    Tay, concerned that the loan shark might target him and the other workers at the shop, lodged a police report the same day

    "They already have all the information they need to find the man, so why bother this shop and harass them?" she asked

    The couple travelled to Bangkok on Aug 30 and were scheduled to fly to Mae Sot the next day to meet their son, who was said to be sick and receiving treatment at the hospital

    However, they were told that Zhan Feng had actually passed away 2am on May 11 and doctors believed that the victim was abused before being left at the hospital on April 11

    On March 31, Zhan Feng called his parents and informed them that he was in Mae Sot in Tak Province and that he needed RM80,000 for medical treatment; that was the last time the parents heard from him

  • WOMAN FOUND DEAD FROM APPARENT DOG ATTACK IN SEMPORNA

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/07/woman-found-dead-from-apparent-dog-attack-in-semporna

    09/07/2022, 16:05

    53.33% Shortened!

    Wednesday, 07 Sep 2022

    Police were alerted to the discovery of the body by villagers at a junction to Kampung Batu at 8am on Sunday (Sept 4)

    Semporna OCPD Supt Mohd Farhan Lee Abdullah said upon reaching the location, police found the 29-year-old local woman face down on the ground

    The body was then sent for a post-mortem at the Queen Elizabeth Hospital in the state capital on Tuesday (Aug 6)

    “Following the autopsy by medical forensics experts, it was confirmed that the cause of death was excessive bleeding from multiple injuries caused by animal bites,” Supt Mohd Farhan said in a statement on Wednesday (Aug 7)

    He also said those with information on the incident should contact Semporna police station chief Insp Mustapha Abdul Majid at 089-782020.

    Supt Mohd Farhan Lee Abdullah

    ['woman', 'found', 'animal', 'bite', 'semporna']

  • GET FLU SHOT TO AVOID SERIOUS CONSEQUENCES, SENIOR CITIZENS URGED

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/07/get-flu-shot-to-avoid-serious-consequences-senior-citizens-urged

    09/07/2022

    64.71% Shortened!

    Deputy Health Minister Datuk Dr Noor Azmi Ghazali (pic) said this is because up to 70% of hospitalisations and 85% of deaths related to flu occur among their age group, according to the US Centers for Disease Control (CDC)

    "Apart from that, it is equally important to stay healthy, maintain a healthy diet and stay physically active, as well as get enough rest and sleep and go for regular health check-ups,” he said during the launch of the Preventing the Flu at 65 and Beyond campaign organised by Immunise4Life (IFL) here on Wednesday (Sept 7)

    During the event, Dr Noor Azmi unveiled the "Seven Keys to Happy and Healthy Aging" for older persons to help maintain their health, independence and quality of life, one of the keys being flu prevention

    "In the meantime, let's support the older generations in flu prevention through an all-of-society approach

    Remind our aged parents to get their flu shot annually," he said

    Dr Noor Azmi Ghazali

    ['senior', 'flu', 'vaccine', 'shot', 'health']

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/07/billion-dollar-whale-authors-claim-jho-low-uses-wife-as-proxy-to-open-bank-accounts-join-royal-hong-kong-yacht-club/26979

    09/07/2022, 14:05

    53.85% Shortened!

    In the latest episode of Finding Jho Low on their YouTube channel dubbed “Project Brazen”, Hope said that Chuan has been the main conduit for Low’s activities as her name was allegedly found in a lot of bills related to the Penang-born fugitive, including an application to join the Royal Hong Kong Yacht Club

    “We found an application to join the Royal Hong Kong Yacht Club

    “So one of the things in the document is that she describes herself as a group investment director for a company in Hong Kong called Kinetic Profit Company Limited and another thing that’s interesting in there is that she has a bank account at ICBC in Hong Kong.” ICBC is the abbreviation for Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (ICBC), a Chinese multinational bank

    It also has a Shanghai, a mainland China-based real estate subsidiary, which is interesting, because we have also heard that Jho Low is still in the kind of real estate business,” he added

    Wright and Hope have been on a quest to determine Low’s whereabouts and previously shared a photo on Twitter that they claimed showed Low in Shanghai Disneyland on Christmas Eve 2019

    An Interpol Red Notice was issued for Low in 2016

  • PKR TO START 'MEGA CERAMAH' IN SEATS HELD BY ITS EX-LAWMAKERS WHO 'BETRAYED' PARTY THIS SUNDAY

    The Gombak parliamentary seat is held by incumbent International Trade and Industry Minister Datuk Seri Azmin Ali, who was formerly PKR deputy president and walked out of the party to join other MPs from Bersatu in February 2020, effectively triggering the collapse of the Pakatan Harapan (PH) coalition

    "Seats contested but not won indirectly will remain with the party

    "The seat contested by Bersatu will be negotiated now

    So any discussion about the entry of any party has not been discussed so far," he said

  • 1MDB TRIAL: RM8.4M IN 38 CHEQUES ISSUED FROM NAJIB'S AMISLAMIC ACCOUNT FROM MARCH 2011 TO MAY 2012, INCLUDING TO UMNO

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/07/1mdb-trial-rm84m-in-38-cheques-issued-from-najibs-amislamic-account-from-march-2011-to-may-2012-including-to-umno/26957

    09/07/2022, 13:05

    50.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Sept 7 — Former prime minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak's AmIslamic Bank account had been used to issue a total of 38 cheques totalling RM8.4 million in just slightly over a years' time during the March 2011 to May 2012 period, a bank officer told the High Court here today

    Badrul Hisam Mohamad, senior manager of AmBank’s cheque processing centre, was testifying as the 36th prosecution witness in Najib's trial over the misappropriation of RM2.28 billion of 1Malaysia Development Berhad (1MDB) funds

    Today, Badrul Hisam further verified seven cheques issued from the same AmIslamic bank account owned by Najib during the August 2011 to November 2011 period, with the total sum being RM2,130,500 or RM2.13 million

    This includes a RM800,000 cheque to Selangor Umno which was issued on September 21 and deposited on September 29, 2011 at CIMB's Damansara Town Centre branch, and a RM1 million to Selangor Umno issued on November 30 and deposited on December 2, 2011 at CIMB's Jalan Tun Perak branch

    Badrul Hisam also verified 18 cheques today that were issued from January 2012 to May 2012 that totalled RM4,985,600

    This includes RM100,000 each to former ministers Tan Sri Kasitah Gaddam and Datuk Seri Richard Riot (who are politicians from Sabah and Sarawak respectively); and a total of RM32,600 to Najib's former political secretary Wong Nai Chee; a total of RM2.1 million to Selangor Umno; a total of RM140,000 to Pekan Umno; RM200,000 to Barisan Nasional's Bandar Tun Razak division; RM400,000 to Macang Umno; RM1 million to tycoon Tan Sri Lim Soon Peng; RM360,000 to KL Media House Sdn Bhd; and RM178,000 to Two One Holidays Malaysia Sdn Bhd

    ['najib', 'issue', 'total', 'cheque', 'million']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Sept 7 — Former prime minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak's AmIslamic Bank account had been used to issue a total of 38 cheques totalling RM8.4 million in just slightly over a years' time during the March 2011 to May 2012 period, a bank officer told the High Court here today

    Badrul Hisam Mohamad, senior manager of AmBank’s cheque processing centre, was testifying as the 36th prosecution witness in Najib's trial over the misappropriation of RM2.28 billion of 1Malaysia Development Berhad (1MDB) funds

    Today, Badrul Hisam further verified seven cheques issued from the same AmIslamic bank account owned by Najib during the August 2011 to November 2011 period, with the total sum being RM2,130,500 or RM2.13 million

    This includes a RM800,000 cheque to Selangor Umno which was issued on September 21 and deposited on September 29, 2011 at CIMB's Damansara Town Centre branch, and a RM1 million to Selangor Umno issued on November 30 and deposited on December 2, 2011 at CIMB's Jalan Tun Perak branch

    Badrul Hisam also verified 18 cheques today that were issued from January 2012 to May 2012 that totalled RM4,985,600

    This includes RM100,000 each to former ministers Tan Sri Kasitah Gaddam and Datuk Seri Richard Riot (who are politicians from Sabah and Sarawak respectively); and a total of RM32,600 to Najib's former political secretary Wong Nai Chee; a total of RM2.1 million to Selangor Umno; a total of RM140,000 to Pekan Umno; RM200,000 to Barisan Nasional's Bandar Tun Razak division; RM400,000 to Macang Umno; RM1 million to tycoon Tan Sri Lim Soon Peng; RM360,000 to KL Media House Sdn Bhd; and RM178,000 to Two One Holidays Malaysia Sdn Bhd

    ['najib', 'issue', 'total', 'cheque', 'million']

    "Thomas will rightly have a place in Chelsea’s history after winning the Champions League, the Super Cup and Club World Cup in his time here.“As the new ownership group reaches 100 days since taking over the club, and as it continues its hard work to take the club forward, the new owners believe it is the right time to make this transition."Yet it is less than a week since they finished backing the German in the summer transfer market to the record level of £273m
